name: ViperFX-RE-Releases
author: WSTxda
README:
# ViPER4Android FX Redesign (ViperFX RE) ViPER4Android FX with Material You design and improvements [![Platform](https://img.shields.io/badge/android-platform?style=for-the-badge&label=platform&labelColor=21262d&color=6e7681)](https://www.android.com) [![API](https://img.shields.io/badge/24%2B-level?style=for-the-badge&logo=android&logoColor=3cd382&label=API&labelColor=21262d&color=ff663b)](https://developer.android.com/studio/releases/platforms) [![Release](https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/WSTxda/ViperFX-RE-Releases?display_name=tag&style=for-the-badge&logo=github&labelColor=21262d&color=1f6feb)](https://github.com/WSTxda/ViperFX-RE-Releases/releases/latest) [![Downloads](https://img.shields.io/github/downloads/WSTxda/ViperFX-RE-Releases/total?style=for-the-badge&labelColor=21262d&color=238636)](https://github.com/WSTxda/ViperFX-RE-Releases/releases) **Application preview**
Screenshots ![screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/WSTxda/ViperFX-RE-Releases/main/Images/Screenshots.png)
**How to install** - Download the driver module and flash it to your device - Reboot your device - Download and install the ViPER4Android FX Redesign apk - Enjoy the enhanced sound! > [!NOTE] > Root is required, along with a module installer like Magisk, KernelSU, APatch, etc... **Download driver module** [](https://github.com/WSTxda/ViPERFX_RE/releases) **Download ViPER4Android FX Redesign** [](https://github.com/WSTxda/ViperFX-RE-Releases/releases) [](https://t.me/WSTprojects) **Donate** [](https://bit.ly/2lV0E6u) [](https://www.buymeacoffee.com/wstxda) **Special thanks** - [Iscle](https://github.com/iscle) and [Martmists](https://github.com/Martmists-GH) for their reverse engineering work - [Thomas W.](https://github.com/pittvandewitt) and [Iscle](https://github.com/iscle) for developing the original application - [Project Material](https://t.me/projectmaterial) for assisting with components used in the redesign
changeLog:
New

  • Added Reverberation option with all adjustable settings
  • Ability to set the app as the default audio effects application
  • Added new icons in certain options

Improvements

  • Refreshed alert dialog and bottom sheet dialog components design
  • Improved preference switch bar design and behavior
  • Updated seek bar style inspired by Material3 design
  • Adjusted padding for snackbar component
  • Reworked layout paddings for a more homogeneous view
  • Improved light and dark theme support with updated colors
  • Updated UI fonts with new styles, family, and sizes
  • Better support for landscape mode screen

Fixes

  • Corrected simplified Chinese translation (#15)

Others

  • Improved driver status summary when the driver service is not initialized
  • Updated driver links to the new driver repository
  • Added GitHub repository links in settings
  • Various small improvements for interface and bug fixes

New driver module required

Important

The application now operates with a new driver module. To enable the Reverberation feature and resolve issues with Stereo3DSurround, it's necessary to install the new driver module and uninstall the previous version.
READMEsummary: ViPER4Android FX Redesign with Material You design and improvements.
changeLogSummary: The application now operates with a new driver module.
